title: (转载)1.4.7未来战争Mod
author: Cpt.Dunn
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Cpt.Dunn 于 2013-2-16 09:45 编辑 

最近在地图版绝望了,原创地图加分加的还没我转载的多……所以听从灯泡的意见转战Mod版试试……


作者：Alikhan144
原帖：http://www.planetminecraft.com/mod/147-future-warfare-aliens-laser-guns/
介绍：
Biomes:Alien Biome - A forest infested with Aliens (For best look put on rain, tiny render distance and night)Current Weapons:PR36 - Laser gun that uses PR36 clipTeleforce - Gun that shoots electric shock and can burn trees! Uses Teleforce clip.T3 Grenade - A standard frag grenade, small explosion radius.Current Mobs:Tribal Alien - A wild tribe alien that deals 8 half hearts of damage and attacks villagers. (Can spawned with spawn egg)Achievements:Obminium Ingot! - Get it by smelting the obminium rock.Crafting:

Teleforce -[%] [ * ] [   ]    % = Iron Ingot
[%] [%] [   ]     *  = Obminium Ingot
[   ] [   ] [   ] Teleforce Battery -[  ] [%] [  ]    % = Iron Ingot
[  ] [ * ] [  ]     * = Redstone Dust
[  ] [%] [  ] 

PR36 - [%] [ * ] [%]    % = Iron Ingot
[%] [ # ] [%]     *  = Glass Block
[%] [%] [   ]      # = Obminium IngotPR36 Clip - [  ] [%] [  ]    % = Iron Ingot
[  ] [%] [  ] 
[  ] [%] [  ]  
Obminium Armor - Same as other armors but use obminium Ingots

Obminium Rock -Put diamond in the middle and obsidian around itObminium Ingot - Smelt the Obminium Rock
Next Version:


Upcoming features:Tanks!More laser gunsAdvanced equipment and gadgetsGun SightsUFOsRobots!Better textures!More Realistic craftingAnd more...视频：http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=5il46tuOyLE

replies.author: wangwing82
replies.txt_content: 生物群落：外星生物群系——森林出没的外星人（最好看把雨，微小的渲染的距离和晚上）目前的武器：pr36激光枪使用pr36夹teleforce枪射出电击可以燃烧的树木！使用teleforce夹。T3手榴弹-一个标准的手榴弹，爆炸半径。目前的暴徒：一个野蛮部落的部落的外星人外星人造成8的伤害和攻击村民半颗心。（能产生卵蛋）成果：obminium锭！-把它冶炼obminium岩。制作：teleforce—[ % ] [×] [ ] % =铁锭[ % ] [ % ] [ ]×= obminium锭[ ] [ ] [ ]teleforce电池—[ ] [ ] [ ] % % =铁锭[ ] [ ] [ ] * * =红石粉[ ] [ ] [ ] %pr36—[ % ] [×] [ % ]为铸铁钢锭[ % ] [ # ] [ % ]×=玻璃块[ % ] [ % ] [ ] # = obminium锭pr36夹—[ ] [ ] [ ] % % =铁锭[ ] [ ] [ ] %[ ] [ ] [ ] %obminium盔甲—其他的盔甲而使用相同obminium锭obminium岩—把钻石中的黑曜石周围obminium锭—闻obminium岩下一个版本：即将到来的特点：坦克！更多的激光枪先进的设备和工具瞄准具不明飞行物机器人！更好的纹理！更现实的制作和更多的…
